page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: { {1915 They saw the first car in the square - a Model T Ford. They also saw a tractor. They walked everywhere. There weren't any buses. For special trips they went on a horse and cart. { {1925 They had to walk to school but when they went on a trip, they got on Mr. Rawling's bus and, if it was wet, he would pull a cover over because it was an open bus. You had to get up a ladder to get on the bus.{ { {1945 We all travelled on bicycles. Big boys went on motor bikes. There were very few cars around but there were some buses.
